title: Hash One Gaming - LF Master/Challenger Top & JG - Competitive Ranked 5's

embed.description: Beat the best, smash the rest!

body:
Hey there,

My name is Tom (or iPlayHeaps) and I'm the manager of Hash One Gaming. Right now, we're currently recruiting 2x jungle and 2x top lane for our competitive league of legends teams on the oceanic server. we're looking for a few dedicated people who are wanting to improve their skill in a team environment, whilst competing in tournaments - both online and LAN.

As of now, we have three competitive teams who are eager for the season to start so that they may start aiming for the top 8 on the leaderboard. These teams are:
**Hash1 AlterEgo:** *Challenger Division*
**Hash1 Escape:** *Diamond 1*
**Hash1 Prime:** *Diamond*

**As a recruit wanting to join Hash One Gaming, we'd expect you to be:**
*1. Dedicated to training at least 3 times per week
2. Non-Toxic
3. A mature player with a competitive drive
4. Diamond 1/Master/Challenger
5. Teamspeak3 and a working microphone*


If you think you'd fit the position, please add me ingame and fill out this  quick form: http://hash1.pw/joinhash1

replies.body: Hey, my summoners name is Nomercyyy. I'm in D3 now and top main. I was a dota1 player, have got the 1st place in an Adelaide LAN tournament and 2nd in a Sydney tournament in the year of 2013. I feel confident to become one of the best top laner in OCE challenger game.
